data.message: Look at all the Trump supporters that ran to his page to cry. He told you he doesnt want you as a fan!! I think he had a song called "I just dont give a fuck" 😂

replies.message: Look at all the libtards that go to trumps page.  And if you think Hillary Clinton was the better choice kys
Sorry I don't go to Trump's page. He disgusts me. Wth does Eminem have to do with Hillary anyway? Did I bring her name up? Thats always the argument you guys like to go to..."but Hillary and Obama".
Kimberly LeGrand did you just say trump disgusts you? But Eminem doesn't? Lmao. You're a basket case.
Kimberly you are a sensitive bitch all triggered by Trump. So isnt eminem

Your trash go lose some weight
Yes Kevin Cunningham that's why we call them libtards 😂😂😂

fuck trump

Nope didn't come to cry, just come to build up my self esteem reading all these comments from complete idiots. And you have not disappointed me. Thanks for the boost and the laughs.
So Kim you don't care he talked about raping women? You sound like a typical liberal. I'm just glad I was blessed with free thought.

Katrina Blust dumb ass I'm republican but there you go again playing victim. Good job virtue signaling dumb ass.
